name: Main Brewery
hoursOfOperation:
Wed - Thu: 3:00 pm - 9:00 pm
Fri - Sat: 2:00 pm - 10:00 pm
Sun: 2:00 pm - 7:00 pm

brewery.name: North Jetty Brewing
brewery.description: We are a brewery and tap room in Seaview, Washington on Washington's Long Beach Peninsula.  We offer craft beer, gourmet sodas, lemonade, and light snacks.  We do not have a kitchen but you are welcome to bring in outside food.  People under 21 welcome with an adult until 6pm most nights.  We have live trivia as well as live music.
